Sentencas: The theory of functionally graded material (FGM) was applied in the fabrication process of PEN (Positive-Electrolyte-Negative), the core component of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Fabrication and electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cell components by atmospheric and suspension plasma spray

Sentencas: To enhance its electrochemical performance, the functionally graded PEN of planar SOFC was prepared by atmospheric plasma spray (APS).
Titulo: Fabrication and electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cell components by atmospheric and suspension plasma spray

Sentencas: The cross-sectional SEM micrograph and element energy spectrum of the resultant PEN were analyzed.
Titulo: Fabrication and electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cell components by atmospheric and suspension plasma spray

Sentencas: Its interface resistance was also compared with that without the graded layers to investigate the electrochemical performance enhanced by the functionally graded layers.
Titulo: Fabrication and electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cell components by atmospheric and suspension plasma spray

Sentencas: Moreover, a new process, suspension plasma spray (SPS) was applied to preparing the SOFC electrolyte.
Titulo: Fabrication and electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cell components by atmospheric and suspension plasma spray

Sentencas: Higher densification of the coating by SPS, 1.61%, is observed, which is helpful to effectively improve its electrical conductivity.
Titulo: Fabrication and electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cell components by atmospheric and suspension plasma spray

Sentencas: The grain size of the electrolyte coating fabricated by SPS is also smaller than that by APS, which is more favourable to obtain the dense electrolyte coatings.
Titulo: Fabrication and electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cell components by atmospheric and suspension plasma spray

Sentencas: To sum up, all mentioned above can prove that the hybrid process of APS and SPS could be a better approach to fabricate the PEN of SOFC stacks, in which APS is for porous electrodes and SPS for dense electrolyte.
Titulo: Fabrication and electrochemical performance of solid oxide fuel cell components by atmospheric and suspension plasma spray
